sections.name: Mafika Ayuwari
sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Good
traits.text: Good effects often manipulate energy from good-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to evil divine servants or divine servants of evil deities. A creature with this trait is good in alignment.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

automatic_abilities.name: Brilliant Wordplay
automatic_abilities.trigger: Mafika is the target of a linguistic effect
automatic_abilities.effect: Mafika attempts to counteract the effect (counteract modifier +30). If he counteracts the effect, he can use that effect on a new target of his choice within 30 feet.

traits.name: Abjuration
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

automatic_abilities.name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
automatic_abilities.trigger: Mafika or an ally within 30 feet takes damage
automatic_abilities.effect: Mafika expends a prepared spell in a spell slot. He reduces the triggering damage by four times the spell slot's level.
automatic_abilities.text: Mafika transforms unrealized spell energy into a protective shield;

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Two-Hand
traits.text: This weapon can be wielded with two hands. Doing so changes its weapon damage die to the indicated value. This change applies to all the weapon's damage dice, such as those from _striking_ runes.

ability.name: Halcyon Surge
ability.text: Mafika casts an arcane spell that takes 2 actions or fewer to Cast, then casts a druid order spell that takes 2 actions or fewer to Cast (paying 1 Focus Point, as normal).

ability.name: Shift Spell

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

ability.requirement: Mafika has an area spell active with a remaining duration and he is within the spell's range
ability.effect: Mafika moves the spell's area to a new point of origin. The spell's remaining duration is reduced by half. Instantaneous or permanent effects of the spell (such as damage or healing) are unaffected and aren't repeated.
